name: Vigilancer 2099
summary: Vigilancer 2099 is a third-person open-world cyberpunk bounty-hunting game set in a gated, privatized, and isolated Megabuilding. Enter the skin, soul, and mind of your Vigilancer as you fight to stay alive long enough to pay off your bounty.
